title: Fix watson crashes in StartLocalNode.
body:
Customer may be trying to call this without setting a node or setting a value of 1 both which will trigger an index out of range exception.
https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/1157058

commit.message: Fix watson crashes in StartLocalNode.  Customer may be trying to call this without setting a node or setting a value of 1 both which will trigger an index out of range exception.

nodes.body: Turns out this resolved #4906, too. Thanks!
